mapper.select: select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id BookId, price, date from orders
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id BookId, price, date from orders Where order_id like ${orderId}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id BookId, price, date from orders Where cust_id like ${custId}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id BookId, price, date from orders Where book_id like ${bookId}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id BookId, price, date from orders Where price >= ${price}
select order_id orderId, cust_id custId, book_id BookId, price, date from orders Where date >= ${date}
